DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine collagenase reduce degree contracture primary joint subject Dupuytren 's disease . This study design part large clinical program , adult patient Dupuytren 's contracture palpable cord , data 2 pivotal Placebo-Controlled study ( AUX-CC-857 AUX-CC-859 ) 7 non-pivotal study evaluate .
DOC.detailed_description: In random , placebo control , double blind study , collagenase injection therapy investigate 's ability disrupt Dupuytren 's cord . Resultant cord disruption may obviate need patient surgery correct finger flexion contractures Dupuytren 's disease .
DOC.criteria: Subjects least 18 year age , either sex race . Subjects residual Dupuytren 's disease fixedflexion deformity finger ( ) least 20 degree great , cause palpable cord . Subjects positive `` tabletop test '' define inability simultaneously place affect finger ( ) palm flat table top . Subjects must willing participate complete study , comply procedure sign IRB approve write consent form . Subjects must able understand adhere visit schedule . They must able follow study procedure instruction , agree report concomitant medication adverse event accurately consistently . Women childbearing potential must agree use acceptable method birth control must surgically sterilize ( hysterectomy tubal ligation ) . Women childbearing age urine pregnancy test Day 0 ( day injection ) prior injection . Exclusion Criteria Women nursing pregnant ( evidence positive urine pregnancy test time enrollment ) . Subjects participate investigational drug trial within 30 day enrollment study . Subjects receive surgery Dupuytren 's disease within 30 day enrollment study . Subjects know allergy AA4500 inactive ingredient AA4500 injection . Subjects know allergy doxycycline . Subjects medical condition would make unsuitable enrollment .
